subject: Athletics and Sports
Olympic Games (2012)
Television
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Cable Television
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Dick Ebersol, longtime head of NBC Sports, might soon have a new boss — Comcast — if discussions result in the nation’s largest cable operator acquiring control of NBC Universal.
snippet: Dick Ebersol, longtime head of NBC Sports, might soon have a new boss — Comcast — if discussions result in the nation’s largest cable operator acquiring control of NBC Universal.
